thread.title: Britney Spears' new mansion cost $7.4 million and it's stunning
thread.title_full: Britney Spears' new mansion cost $7.4 million and it's stunning - seattlepi.com

author: Tyler White
title: Britney Spears' new mansion cost $7.4 million and it's stunning
text:
Sometimes she runs, sometimes she hides and sometimes she buys a $7.4 million mansion in Thousand Oaks, California.
Pop star Britney Spears made it her prerogative to drop the large sum of money on the home, which spans 12,464 square feet and consists of five bedroom and 7.5 bathrooms, according to Variety .
The home has a large master bedroom with a balcony and a soaking tub, as well as a breakfast nook with a fireplace, according to a Zillow listing .
RELATED: 'Guitar Mansion,' known to be Alabama's largest home, will be up for sale
Some of the amenities of the home include a 35-foot high ceiling, an infinity pool, spa, prominent kitchen and a temperature-controlled wine cellar, according to the listing.
The property also has a three-green golf course, a tennis court and a 1,000 square-foot pool with a kitchen, according to the Zillow listing.
It looks like Spears’ advice about living in a big mansion rings true: “You better work...”
RELATED: Britney Spears’ baby sister slathers on the defense with large knife during Pita Pit brawl
Spears recently extended her residency at the Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, which garnered her another $5 million, according to the Daily Mail .
She told the publication she couldn’t “imagine saying goodbye” to Vegas and her crew at this time.
Click through the slideshow to see photos provided by Zillow.com of this beautiful home.
